page.title: 12MY SATURDAY
page.content: I get up at 8:00 and have cereal for breakfast. After washing and dressing, I watch a T.V. programme called No.73. My grandmother usually visits on a Saturday and she arrives a 11:00.She sits in our large leather chair and knits.We then have lunch at 1:00.In the afternoon I go to Boots or W.H. Smith's to do some shopping.If the weather is poor I might be forced to do some homework! If I can I watch the old films on Channel Four.They are very different from today's films.At 6:00 we have tea and then I watch T.V. throughout Saturday night. I prefer a lazy Saturday doing little as I do a lot of work on a Sunday.
